title: Seahawks 17, Broncos 16: Geno's not writing back! (MNF Recap)
itunes:title: Seahawks 17, Broncos 16: Geno's not writing back! (MNF Recap)
description:
Gregg Rosenthal is joined by The Ringer's Steven Ruiz to recap the Geno Smith bowl! The Seahawks defeat the Broncos 17-16 in Russell Wilson's return to Seattle, and the co-presidents of the Geno Smith Fan Club can't get enough. The hosts recap the wild ending with the Broncos trying a 64-yard field goal, Geno's success, the Broncos struggles, and close the show with some off-topic tidbits from Sunday night and Monday film study.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
